question: The marine ambulance named “Pratheeksha” has been recently acquired by which state?
explanation:
The Fisheries Department of the state of Kerala has acquired the first marine ambulance named “Pratheeksha”.
The marine ambulance is constructed by Cochin Shipyard Ltd. The vessel can move at a speed of 14 knots per hour and will be used to rescue fishermen in distress. The vessel has inbuilt facility to provide medical support to as many as ten people at a time.
